process.command: rootprocid TEXT, title varchar(128), label varchar(255), creator varchar(32), PRIMARY KEY (rootprocid)

rootprocid TEXT, subprocid TEXT, version varchar(16), minuserstratum integer, title varchar(128), label varchar(255), creator varchar(32), access varchar(8), createdate date, PRIMARY KEY (subprocid,version)
subprocid TEXT, division varchar(16), PRIMARY KEY (subprocid,division)
subprocid TEXT, system varchar(16), srcsystem varchar(16), dstsystem varchar(16), srcdivision varchar(16), dstdivision varchar(16), PRIMARY KEY (subprocid,system)

rootprocid TEXT, subprocid TEXT, version varchar(16), parent varchar(32), element varchar(32), paramid varchar(32), paramtyp varchar(8), tagorattr character(1), required character(1), defaultvalue varchar(32), bandid varchar(32) DEFAULT 'False', PRIMARY KEY (subprocid,version,parent,element,paramid,defaultvalue,bandid)

rootprocid TEXT, subprocid TEXT, version varchar(16), parent varchar(32), element varchar(32), paramid varchar(32), setvalue varchar(32), label varchar(128), PRIMARY KEY (subprocid,version,parent, element,paramid,setvalue)

rootprocid varchar(32), subprocid varchar(32), version varchar(16), parent varchar(32), element varchar(32), paramid varchar(32), minval real, maxval real, PRIMARY KEY (subprocid,version,parent,element,paramid)
